translation: There, having made the mind one-pointed, with the actions of the mind and senses controlled, let him, seated on the seat, practice Yoga for the purification of the self.
commentary: 6.12 There there? Concentrated onepointed? The mind the mind? doing having made? yatacittandriyakriyaá¸¥ one who has controlled the actions of the mind and the senses? sitting being seated? seat on the seat? Yunjyat let him practice? Yoga Yoga? Atmavishuddhaye for the purification of the self.Commentary The self means the mind. The real Supreme Self is the Atma. This is Primary (Primary). Mind is also the self.
